body:
Hey guys, I was on the website earlier and I noticed this feature, displayed under 'general leaderboards' when you click on 'stats' which is shown on the top bar above: 

https://gyazo.com/acda31b4d2617703775eb8ff9cd11c0b


For anyone who can't/doesn't want to open the gyazo, it displays the words 'Experience Leaderboards March 21st.'
Although I am not 100% sure what this is, this could finally be the prestige-like update the older players have been asking for.

What are your thoughts?
-Lokigh
body_tagged:

For anyone who can't/doesn't want to open the gyazo, it displays the words 'Experience Leaderboards March 21st.'
Although I am not 100% sure what this is, this could finally be the prestige-like update the older players have been asking for.

What are your thoughts?
-Lokigh
